value.title: Why is Vertipaq so fast? Part 3: Segment Elimination
value.excerpt: Why is Vertipaq so fast? Segmenting the data is one of Vertipaq tricks to manage data at blazing fast speeds. In this video, I will explain what that is.  In previous videos (part 2) we cover what it means that Vertipaq is a columnar database and what that does to improve the performance of your Powerpivot
